removed.name: AVX3Threshold
removed.description: Minimum array size in bytes to use AVX512 intrinsicsfor copy, inflate and fill. When this value is set as zerocompare operations can also use AVX512 intrinsics.

Obsoleted in JDK12
Expired in JDK13

removed.name: AllowNonVirtualCalls
removed.description: Obey the ACC_SUPER flag and allow invokenonvirtual calls

Deprecated in JDK11

removed.name: AssumeMP
removed.description: (Deprecated) Instruct the VM to assume multiple processors are available

removed.name: CompileTheWorld
removed.description: Compile all methods in all classes in bootstrap class path (stress test)

removed.name: CompileTheWorldPreloadClasses
removed.description: Preload all classes used by a class before start loading

removed.name: CompileTheWorldSafepointInterval
removed.description: Force a safepoint every n compiles so sweeper can keep up

removed.name: CompileTheWorldStartAt
removed.description: First class to consider when using +CompileTheWorld

removed.name: CompileTheWorldStopAt
removed.description: Last class to consider when using +CompileTheWorld

removed.name: CompilerThreadHintNoPreempt
removed.description: (Solaris only) Give compiler threads an extra quanta

Deprecated in JDK11
Obsoleted in JDK12
Expired in JDK13

removed.name: DumpSharedMappingsInCore
removed.description: If true, sets bit 3 of /proc/PID/coredump_filter, thus resulting in file-backed shared mappings of the process to be dumped into the corefile.

removed.name: EmitSync
removed.description: (Unsafe, Unstable) Control emission of inline sync fast-path code
removed.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK12
Expired in JDK13

removed.name: ErrorFileToStderr
removed.description: If true, error data is printed to stderr instead of a file

removed.name: ErrorFileToStdout
removed.description: If true, error data is printed to stdout instead of a file

removed.name: ErrorReportServer
removed.description: Override built-in error report server address
removed.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK12
Expired in JDK13

removed.name: ExecuteInternalVMTests
removed.description: Enable execution of internal VM tests

removed.name: G1HRRSUseSparseTable
removed.description: When true, use sparse table to save space.

removed.name: IgnoreUnverifiableClassesDuringDump
removed.description: Do not quit -Xshare:dump even if we encounter unverifiable classes. Just exclude them from the shared dictionary.
removed.deprecation:
Deprecated in JDK10
Obsoleted in JDK12
Expired in JDK13

removed.name: MonitorInUseLists
removed.description: Track Monitors for Deflation

Deprecated in JDK10
Obsoleted in JDK12
Expired in JDK13

Deprecated in JDK11
Obsoleted in JDK12

removed.name: PrintSafepointStatisticsCount
removed.description: (Deprecated) Total number of safepoint statistics collected before printing them out

Deprecated in JDK11
Obsoleted in JDK12
Expired in JDK13

removed.name: PrintSafepointStatisticsTimeout
removed.description: (Deprecated) Print safepoint statistics only when safepoint takes more than PrintSafepointSatisticsTimeout in millis

Deprecated in JDK11
Obsoleted in JDK12
Expired in JDK13

removed.name: ShenandoahGCMode
removed.description: GC mode to use. Among other things, this defines which barriers are in in use. Possible values are: satb - snapshot-at-the-beginning concurrent GC (three pass mark-evac-update); iu - incremental-update concurrent GC (three pass mark-evac-update); passive - stop the world GC only (either degenerated or full)

removed.name: ShenandoahLoadRefBarrier
removed.description: Turn on/off load-reference barriers in Shenandoah

removed.name: ShenandoahRegionSize
removed.description: Static heap region size. Set zero to enable automatic sizing.

removed.name: ShenandoahSelfFixing
removed.description: Fix references with load reference barrier. Disabling this might degrade performance.

removed.name: ShenandoahSoftMaxHeapSize
removed.description: Soft limit for maximum heap size (in bytes)

removed.description: (Unstable)
removed.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK12
Expired in JDK13

removed.name: TransmitErrorReport
removed.description: Enable error report transmission on erroneous termination

Obsoleted in JDK12

Expired in JDK13

removed.description: (Solaris only) Give VM thread an extra quanta

Expired in JDK13

removed.name: VerboseInternalVMTests
removed.description: Turn on logging for internal VM tests.

removed.name: VerifyInterpreterStackTop
removed.description: Verify interpreter stack top at every stack expansion (AArch64 only)

removed.name: ZConcurrentJNIWeakGlobalHandles
removed.description: Clean JNI WeakGlobalRefs concurrently

removed.name: ZConcurrentStringTable
removed.description: Clean StringTable concurrently

removed.name: ZConcurrentVMWeakHandles
removed.description: Clean VM WeakHandles concurrently

removed.name: ZMarkStacksMax
removed.description: Maximum number of bytes allocated for marking stacks

removed.name: ZSymbolTableUnloading

removed.name: ZWeakRoots
removed.description: Treat JNI WeakGlobalRefs and StringTable as weak roots

removed.name: ZapHighNonSignificantBits

added.name: AllocateOldGenAt
added.description: Path to the directoy where a temporary file will be created to use as the backing store for old generation.File of size Xmx is pre-allocated for performance reason, sowe need that much space available

added.name: AllowArchivingWithJavaAgent
added.description: Allow Java agent to be run with CDS dumping

added.name: DisableBCCheck
added.description: tell sim not to invoke bccheck callback

added.name: G1PeriodicGCInterval
added.description: Number of milliseconds after a previous GC to wait before triggering a periodic gc. A value of zero disables periodically enforced gc cycles.

added.name: G1PeriodicGCInvokesConcurrent
added.description: Determines the kind of periodic GC. Set to true to have G1 perform a concurrent GC as periodic GC, otherwise use a STW Full GC.

added.name: G1PeriodicGCSystemLoadThreshold
added.description: Maximum recent system wide load as returned by the 1m value of getloadavg() at which G1 triggers a periodic GC. A load above this value cancels a given periodic GC. A value of zero disables this check.

added.name: G1YoungExpansionBufferPercent
added.description: When heterogenous heap is enabled by AllocateOldGenAt option, after every GC, young gen is re-sized which involves system calls to commit/uncommit memory. To reduce these calls, we keep a buffer of extra regions to absorb small changes in young gen length. This flag takes the buffer size as an percentage of young gen length

added.name: NotifySimulator
added.description: tell the AArch64 sim where we are in method code

added.name: PrintCodeHeapAnalytics
added.description: Print code heap usage statistics on exit and on full condition

added.name: ShenandoahAcmpBarrier
added.description: Turn on/off acmp barriers in Shenandoah

added.name: ShenandoahAllocationStallThreshold
added.description: When allocation tracing is enabled, the allocation stalls larger than this threshold would be reported as warnings. Time is in microseconds.

added.name: ShenandoahAllocationTrace
added.description: Trace allocation latencies and stalls. Can be expensive when lots of allocations happen, and may introduce scalability bottlenecks.

added.name: ShenandoahAllowMixedAllocs
added.description: Allow mixing mutator and collector allocations in a single region

added.name: ShenandoahAlwaysPreTouch
added.description: Pre-touch heap memory, overrides global AlwaysPreTouch

added.name: ShenandoahCommonGCStateLoads
added.description: Enable commonming for GC state loads in generated code.

added.name: ShenandoahConcurrentScanCodeRoots
added.description: Scan code roots concurrently, instead of during a pause

added.name: ShenandoahCriticalControlThreadPriority
added.description: Shenandoah control thread runs at critical scheduling priority.

added.name: ShenandoahDecreaseRegisterPressure
added.description: Try to reuse after-barrier values to reduce register pressure

added.name: ShenandoahDontIncreaseWBFreq
added.description: Common 2 WriteBarriers or WriteBarrier and a ReadBarrier only if the resulting WriteBarrier isn't executed more frequently

added.name: ShenandoahEvacAssist
added.description: How many objects to evacuate on WB assist path. Use zero to disable.

added.name: ShenandoahFreeThreshold
added.description: Set the percentage of free heap at which a GC cycle is started. Does not apply to all heuristics.

added.name: ShenandoahHeapRegionSize
added.description: Size of the Shenandoah regions. Set to zero to detect automatically.

added.name: ShenandoahKeepAliveBarrier
added.description: Turn on/off keep alive barriers in Shenandoah

added.name: ShenandoahMergeUpdateRefsMaxGap
added.description: If GC is currently running in merged update-refs mode this numbers gives the threshold when to switch to separate update-refs mode. Number is percentage relative to duration(marking)+duration(update-refs).

added.name: ShenandoahMergeUpdateRefsMinGap
added.description: If GC is currently running in separate update-refs mode this numbers gives the threshold when to switch to merged update-refs mode. Number is percentage relative toduration(marking)+duration(update-refs).

added.name: ShenandoahOptimizeInstanceFinals
added.description: Optimize barriers on final instance fields.Turn it off for maximum compatibility with reflection or JNI code that manipulates final fields.

added.name: ShenandoahOptimizeStableFinals
added.description: Optimize barriers on stable fields.Turn it off for maximum compatibility with reflection or JNI code that manipulates final fields.

added.name: ShenandoahParallelSafepointThreads
added.description: Number of parallel threads used for safepoint prolog/epilog

added.name: ShenandoahReadBarrier
added.description: Turn on/off read barriers in Shenandoah

added.name: ShenandoahStoreCheck
added.description: Emit additional code that checks objects are written to only in to-space

added.name: ShenandoahStoreValReadBarrier
added.description: Turn on/off store val read barriers in Shenandoah

added.name: ShenandoahTerminationTrace
added.description: Tracing task termination timings

added.name: ShenandoahUpdateRefsEarly
added.description: Run a separate concurrent reference updating phase afterconcurrent evacuation. Possible values: 'on', 'off', 'adaptive'

added.name: ShenandoahVerifyObjectEquals
added.description: Verify that == and != are not used on oops. Only in fastdebug

added.name: ShenandoahWriteBarrier
added.description: Turn on/off write barriers in Shenandoah

added.name: UseOWSTTaskTerminator
added.description: Use Optimized Work Stealing Threads task termination protocol

added.name: UseShenandoahGC
added.description: Use the Shenandoah garbage collector

added.name: UseSimulatorCache
added.description: tell sim to cache memory updates until exclusive op occurs

added.name: ZMarkStackSpaceLimit
added.description: Maximum number of bytes allocated for mark stacks
